definition: Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

pinyin: Ye1 he2 hua2 Jian4 zheng4 ren2

sentences.english: The breath of Jehovah, like a stream of brimstone , Sets it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的氣如一股硫磺火，使它着起來。

sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端，是在於完全委身於神。

sentences.english: So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，王和以色列衆民爲耶和華的殿行奉獻之禮。

sentences.english: The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓卻仍在丘壇上獻祭，只獻給耶和華他們的神。

sentences.english: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD?
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，你爲什麼站在遠處。

sentences.english: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華不容什麼人欺負他們，爲他們的緣故責備君王。

sentences.english: and burned fragrant incense on it, as the Lord commanded him.
sentences.chinese: 在壇上燒了麝香料做的香，是照耶和華所吩咐他的。

sentences.english: Then said the LORD unto Moses, Behold, I will rain bread from heaven for you;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華對摩西說，我要將糧食從天降給你們。

sentences.english: Therefore the LORD your God has commanded you to observe the Sabbath day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，耶和華你的神吩咐你守安息日。

sentences.english: As for our redeemer, the LORD of hosts is his name, the Holy One of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 我們救贖主的名是萬軍之耶和華以色列的聖者。

sentences.english: 8 the Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.
sentences.chinese: 你出你入耶和華要保護你，從今時直到永遠。

sentences.english: But the plans of the Lord stand firm forever, the purposes of his heart through all generations.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華的壽算永遠立定，他心中的思念萬代常存。

sentences.english: And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華說，所多瑪和蛾摩拉的罪惡甚重，聲聞於我。

sentences.english: "O Lord, God of my master, Abraham," he prayed.
sentences.chinese: “耶和華我主人亞伯拉罕的神阿，”他禱告說。

sentences.english: And he built an altar there to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 也在那裏審判以色列人，且爲耶和華築了一座壇。

sentences.english: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 拿答，亞比戶在耶和華面前獻凡火的時候就死了。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
